# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a media characteristic.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ rawValue: String)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: The raw string value of the media characteristic.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a media characteristic with a string value.

items.description: Creates a media characteristic with a string value.
